summary: This bill, the Terms-of-service Labeling, Design, and Readability Act (TLDR Act), mandates that online service providers create user-friendly summaries, graphic data flow diagrams, and interactive data format versions of their terms of service. The Federal Trade Commission (FTC) would enforce the act, with states also having enforcement powers. The bill defines sensitive information and requires covered entities to disclose information about data handling practices, breaches, and user rights.
